message: A photo I recently posted to filckr via my iPhone 4 and camera+ generated some feedback and an exchange between myself and an accomplished photographer. I always appreciate feedback especially if it contains constructive points that make me think. Here's such an exchange: http://www.flickr.com/photos/areaguides/5575338058/
See many such comments and debates in the flickr D700 group: http://www.flickr.com/groups/nikond700/
